author: stefan2
msg: Fix test failure on Windows caused by lock timeouts.  The root cause is
that APR_STATUS_IS_EBUSY does not work for apr_thread_rwlock_trywrlock
on Windows.  Therefore, we need to grow our own macro for lock-related
(SVN_LOCK_IS_BUSY): new define to replace APR_STATUS_IS_EBUSY on locks

author: sobryan
msg: TRINIDAD-2325: Configurators do not call endRequest properly on Portal redirect
* Added code to allow GlobalConfiguratorImpl to detect when a redirect happens and react accordingly
